title: Refactor Tickboard to use CommsClient for all communication
description: Migrate all direct API calls in tickboard UI to use the unified CommsClient abstraction. Currently events and writes use CommsClient, but reads still use direct api/ticks.ts calls. This refactoring will add read operations to CommsClient and update all components to use it.
closed_reason: All tasks completed. Tickboard UI now uses CommsClient for all communication (read and write operations).
